formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \mathrm{Tax}(T) = \begin{cases} r_1 \cdot T, & 0 \le T \le b_1 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (T - b_1), & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (b_2 - b_1) + r_3 \cdot (T - b_2), & T > b_2 \end{cases}
formulas.raw: \mathrm{Tax}(T) = \begin{cases} r_1 \cdot T, & 0 \le T \le b_1 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (T - b_1), & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (b_2 - b_1) + r_3 \cdot (T - b_2), & T > b_2 \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \mathrm{EffRate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}(T)}{G}\quad(\text{defined as }0\text{ if }G=0), \qquad \mathrm{MarginalRate} = \begin{cases} 0, & T = 0 \\ r_1, & 0 < T \le b_1 \\ r_2, & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_3, & T > b_2 \end{cases}
formulas.raw: \mathrm{EffRate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}(T)}{G}\quad(\text{defined as }0\text{ if }G=0), \qquad \mathrm{MarginalRate} = \begin{cases} 0, & T = 0 \\ r_1, & 0 < T \le b_1 \\ r_2, & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_3, & T > b_2 \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let the inputs be: Gross income G, adjustments/subtractions A ≥ 0, federal tax deduction F ≥ 0, filing status s ∈ {single, hoh, mfj}. Taxable income: \[ T = \max\{0,\; G - A - F \} \] Brackets and rates by status: For s ∈ {single, hoh}: \[ b_1 = 12{,}500,\quad b_2 = 50{,}000,\quad r_1 = 0.0185,\; r_2 = 0.035,\; r_3 = 0.0425 \] For s = mfj: \[ b_1 = 25{,}000,\quad b_2 = 100{,}000,\quad r_1 = 0.0185,\; r_2 = 0.035,\; r_3 = 0.0425 \] Progressive tax due: \[ \mathrm{Tax}(T) = \begin{cases} r_1 \cdot T, & 0 \le T \le b_1 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (T - b_1), & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_1 \cdot b_1 + r_2 \cdot (b_2 - b_1) + r_3 \cdot (T - b_2), & T > b_2 \end{cases} \] Effective and marginal rates: \[ \mathrm{EffRate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}(T)}{G}\quad(\text{defined as }0\text{ if }G=0), \qquad \mathrm{MarginalRate} = \begin{cases} 0, & T = 0 \\ r_1, & 0 < T \le b_1 \\ r_2, & b_1 < T \le b_2 \\ r_3, & T > b_2 \end{cases} \]

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
